snippet: A military court set a life prison term for Vladislav Chelakh, the 20-year-old whose confession was seen by some in Kazakhstan as coerced.
abstract: Military court in Kazakhstan sentences 20-year-old border guard Vladislav Chelakh to life in prison for murder of 15 people near soldier outpost on Chinese border; Chelakh confessed to crime, but many see his confession as coerced, drawing widespread skepticism of authorities.
lead_paragraph: A military court set a life prison term for Vladislav Chelakh, the 20-year-old whose confession was seen by some in Kazakhstan as coerced.

headline.seo: Kazakh Border Guard Sentenced in 15 Killings
headline.main: Kazakh Border Guard Gets Life Term in Killings of Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Kazakh Border Guard Gets Life Term in Killings of Soldiers
